Table 1: Optimization of the trifluoromethylation of (hetero)arenes using trifluoroacetates.[a]
Scheme 1: (A) Decarboxylations via photoredox catalysis.PC, photocatalysts;PC*, excited state photocatalysts;TM, transition metal. (C) Trifluoromethylation reactions with trifluoroacetates enabled by iron photocatalysis.ET, electron transfer
Scheme 2: Scope of the trifluoromethylation of C−H bonds with trifluoroacetates.
